title: Cobra: Blue Rose
sinopse:
Secret was assigned to patrol duty and encounters a firefight between spacecraft. By accident she opens a book called “Megiddo” and gets sucked into the book. Cobra collects intelligence from Jack Baisuta the informer which he claims that he found the way to acquire “the Book of Megiddo”. After Jack vanishing, Cobra was heading to Earth, Hong Kong.

(Source: BookWalker)
